title: Microsoft Teams: Invite Parents via SMS for Communication
description:
Parent Connection allows teachers to communicate with the guardians of a student. To enable parent-teacher communication, admins can now choose either email or SMS as their preferred Parent Connection invitation channel. Sending messages in an SMS-heavy market makes it easier to connect with Parents while keeping teachers' experience simple. These messages sent to parents and guardians will be in plain text, without HTML, formatting, or styles applied. For more details, please visit: https://review.learn.microsoft.com/MicrosoftTeams/edu-parents-app?branch=danismith-parent-app-sms-details#set-a-preferred-invitation-channel
More info: https://review.learn.microsoft.com/MicrosoftTeams/edu-parents-app?branch=danismith-parent-app-sms-details
